content.body: I was actually trying to understand if Deno was non-compliant with ecma262 and it instead chooses to behave like browsers, and I tried to compare it with Node.js. Node.js segfaulted, so I stopped trying to understand what Deno does and focused on Node.js ðŸ˜‚
